titles.title: Mighty, Mighty, Mighty Is The Lord Our God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mighty, mighty, mighty is the Lord our God,
Mighty, mighty, mighty is the Lord our God,
Mighty, mighty, mighty is the Lord our God,
Mighty in the midst of thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's mighty to save and mighty to heal,
Mighty to strengthen and mighty to fill;
Mighty, mighty, mighty is the Lord our God,
Mighty in the midst of thee.
